Package org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.qptl

Class QPTLTemporalHierarchy

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.qptl.QPTLTemporalHierarchy
public class QPTLTemporalHierarchy
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides methods for checking syntactically if a QPTL formula is a standard κ-formula based on [Edward Y. Chang, Zohar Manna, Amir Pnueli: Characterization of Temporal Property Classes. ICALP 1992: 474-486] where κ is safety, guarantee, obligation, recurrence, persistence, or reactivity. A κ-formula specifies a $kappa;-property. A property is specifiable by temporal logics is a κ-property if and only if it is specifiable by a future standard κ-formula. Note that quantifications are not supported.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
